title: Create Google Analytics Filter using Apps Script

metaTags.name: description
metaTags.content: Manage Google Analytics settings from Apps Script by creating View Filters programmatically. In this example I create Referrer Spam Filters.
Create Google Analytics Filter using Apps Script
Manage Google Analytics settings from Apps Script by creating View Filters programmatically. In this example I create Referrer Spam Filters.
